Action.author: scottz
Action.body: It would be desirable to do this at same time as FAB-16897 (moving this suite to the fabric-ca repo, and integrating it into their merge job).

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Even in the event that the maintainers decide to keep the tests in the fabric-ca repo, I would expect them to be included in the merge job to be run directly by the CI with every merge. (If a go test driver would be required after all, then this task could be reopened.)
